LanguageData.StargateMod_GlyphDeciphering.label: glyph deciphering
LanguageData.StargateMod_GlyphDeciphering.description: The glyphs both engraved around ancient arcane portal sites and on mysterious scraps of parchment have meaning. Deciphering them and locating their coordinate system may unlock a new way of travel.
LanguageData.StargateMod_StargateMakingResearch.label: makeshift arcane portal creation
LanguageData.StargateMod_StargateMakingResearch.descr: The materials used to build the ancient arcane portals aren't available on this planet, but we might be able to create a makeshift version.
LanguageData.StargateMod_AdvancedStargateMakingResear: By further studying the original arcane portals, we could create a much better replica using the materials available on the planet.
LanguageData.StargateMod_StargateIrisAlloyResearch.de: An arcane barrier with incredible strength can be made by utilising mithril, oricalcum and steel. It might just be possible to use these tools to make a barrier for an arcane portal.
LanguageData.StargateMod_StargateIrisResearch.label: arcane portal barriers
LanguageData.StargateMod_StargateIrisResearch.descrip: Experimentation reveals that a barrier placed a bare breath from the pool of an arcane portal would stop almost anything from appearing. We can cover the arcane portal and prevent people invading our community through it. Make the barrier at a fabrication bench.
